item.title: vue3+Element封装二次封装表单

<script setup>
  import FormBuilder from "./formBuilder.vue";
  import {computed, h, ref, useTemplateRef} from "vue";

  const formData = ref({
    name: undefined,
    phone: undefined,
    email: undefined,
    sex: undefined,
  });

  const data = ref([])

  const formItems = computed(() => [
        {
          // type: "input",
          // type: () => h('div', {}, '自定义组件'),
          label: "姓名",
          prop: "name",
          slot: 'name',
          placeholder: "Please enter your name",
          clearable: true,
          onClick: () => {
            console.log("click姓名");
          },
          onInput: (e) => {
            console.log("change姓名", e);
          },
        },
        {
          type: "input",
          label: "手机号",
          prop: "phone",
          placeholder: "Please enter your phone",
        },
        {
          type: "input",
          label: "Email",
          prop: "email",
          placeholder: "Please enter your email",
        },
        {
          type: "select",
          label: "性别",
          prop: "sex",
          hidden: formData.value.name === '张三',
          placeholder: "Please enter your email",
          options: data.value
        }
      ]
  )

  setTimeout(() => {
    data.value.push({
          label: "男1",
          value: "1",
          slot: () => h("div", {}, "男1")
        },
        {
          label: "女",
          value: "2",
        })
  }, 3000)

  const rules = {
    name: [
      {required: true, message: "请输入姓名", trigger: "blur"},
      {min: 2, max: 10, message: "长度在 2 到 10 个字符", trigger: "blur"},
    ],
    phone: [
      {required: true, message: "请输入手机号", trigger: "blur"},
      {
        pattern: /^1[3-9]\d{8}$/,
        message: "请输入正确的手机号",
      }
    ],
    email: [
      {required: true, message: "请输入邮箱", trigger: "blur"},
      {
        pattern: /^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+(\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)+$/,
        message: "请输入正确的邮箱",
      }
    ],
    sex: [
      {required: true, message: "请选择性别", trigger: "change"}
    ],
  }

  const formInstance = useTemplateRef('formRef')

  const onSubmit = async () => {
    await formInstance.value?.validate()
  }
</script>

<template>
  <form-builder ref="formRef" v-model="formData" :form-items="formItems" :rules="rules">
    <!--    <template 插槽名称--在formItems中声明例如:#name>
          张三
        </template>-->
  </form-builder>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="onSubmit()">提交</el-button>
</template>

<style lang="less">
  body {
    font-size: 16px !important;
  }
</style>

<script lang="ts" setup>
  import {computed, useTemplateRef} from "vue";
  import {FormInstance} from "element-plus";

  const props = defineProps(['formItems', 'rules'])

  const modelValue = defineModel()

  const componentMap = {
    input: 'el-input',
    number: 'el-input-number',
    select: 'el-select',
  }

  const formInstance = useTemplateRef<FormInstance>('formRef')


  const whiteList = ['type', 'label', 'prop']

  const items = computed(() => props.formItems.filter(item => item.hidden !== true))

  function getProps(item: any) {
    if (item.props) return item.props
    return Object.keys(item).filter(key => !whiteList.includes(key)).reduce((prev, key) => {
      prev[key] = item[key]
      return prev
    }, {})
  }

  function getComponent(item: any) {
    const {type} = item
    if (type && typeof type !== "string") {
      return type
    }

    return componentMap[type || 'input']
  }

  defineExpose({
    validate(...args) {
      return formInstance.value?.validate(...args)
    }
  })
</script>

<template>
  <el-form ref="formRef" :model="modelValue" :rules="rules">
    <el-form-item v-for="item in items" :key="item.prop" :label="item.label" :prop="item.prop"
                  label-width="120" required>
      <slot :name="item.prop" :row="item">
        <component :is="getComponent(item)" v-model="modelValue[item.prop]" v-bind="getProps(item)">
          <template v-if="['select'].includes(item.type)">
            <el-option v-for="option in item.options" :key="option.value" :label="option.label" :value="option.value">
              <component v-if="option.slot !== 'string'" :is="option.slot"></component>
              <slot v-else :option="option" :name="option.slot">{{ option.label }}</slot>
            </el-option>
          </template>
        </component>
      </slot>
    </el-form-item>
  </el-form>
</template>

<style lang="less" scoped>

</style>
